name: DriftWay
description:
DriftWay is the drifting simulator. If you love cars, engines and drifting this game is for you.

Your task is to master the art of drifting. Learn to enter turns and defeat opponents

Feature:
  • Unique car driving system
  • Transmission system and speedometer in km / h of the car!
  • Big track
  • Clever AI
  • Obstacles on the track
  • The behavior of the machine is close to reality
